title: Scared
content: I am a fresher of ece rr campus(I wanted ece only). I don't know why I am suddenly very scared about joining this college after reading this subreddit. Did I make the right decision? Is it really that bad? Pls seniors help.

comments.body: It will be pain in ass at beginning but worth during placements, and the knowledge you gain will be worth at the end cause syllabus is updated compare to others college

I am a fresher and I feel u when even I was reading more and more comments so me and my friends even searched other college comments and almost every where ull have such comments which will make us feel scared or feel if our decision is correct or not even I don't not have a proper answer I feel like we should just try and enjoy with the opportunity we get  and work hard and make the best of it that's all I can say

You've made a decision already and you'll stick with it. It's good that you're scared because it means that you know it'll not be easy and you'll put in the required effort. Moreover, a right or wrong decision is purely subjective and you get what you search for and not what you need on the internet. As a senior I can tell you that it's a good college with a lot of opportunities. You just gotta make the best of it. I wish you all the best for having 4 amazing years of your life.

The thing you've to understand is that people will be more keen on sharing their negative experiences than highlighting their good ones and also, people's negative reviews tend to retain our attention more than good ones. 
So all I have to say is wherever you go you'll have to contend with both good and bad things. 
It's upto you(and also a bit of luck) now to carve up a good four years for yourself.
